name: Cross-Stitch Masters
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of cross stitching and feel like a master of embroidery in Cross Stitch Masters! Color by number, relax, enjoy and have fun! Create fun and colorful pictures and share with your friends, easy and stress free.
This game is for adults and kids any age who loves cross-stitching, knitting, puzzles, nonograms, jigsaws and coloring books. Join us and unleash your creativity!
